messages.message: Hi all, customer is asking for our language support, I know this is the support by ABBYY (https://support.abbyy.com/hc/en-us/articles/360004047940-FineReader-12-specification). Is this page (https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cognitive-services/computer-vision/language-support) the correct list for MARX v3.2, should I be looking at the right most column?
Thanks, this is for SC. They have 3.2. But I guess this raises another question, what are the plans for rollout of 3.2?

@Lee We are doing 2 stages of evaluation on 3.2:
1. Accuracy comparison b/w 2.x and 3.2
2. Resource consumption b/w the two
The comparison analysis is in progress and 3.2 is consuming a lot of resource right now and impossible to productionize.  I will keep you all updated on the progress.
